title: Thai Regulator Orders Zipmex to Suspend Digital Asset Trading and Brokerage Services
description: Zipmex now has 15 days to correct its financial position and create a system to prevent the improper use of customer funds.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
description:
Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

Binance helped out RIpple co-founder Chris Larson by freezing $4.2 million worth of the stolen XRP (XRP) from the hacker. Three people have been linked to the $400 million hack of crypto exchange FTX in 2022, with suggestions it was part of a sim-swap attack. Meanwhile, Polygon Labs has laid off 19% of its staff to “enhance performance.”

Cryptocurrency exchange Binance froze $4.2 million worth of XRP from the $112 million hack on Ripple co-founder Chris Larsen’s personal wallet on Jan. 31. The information was made public by Binance CEO Richard Teng.

It’s not the first time Polygon has embarked on large layoffs. In February 2023, the firm cut 20% of its staff, or roughly 100 people at the time.

Read more

title: Celestia and Ethereum Classic in range, Borroe Finance presale draws attention

title: OKX to delist WAVES to ‘to maintain a robust spot trading environment’
description: The management of the OKX cryptocurrency platform has decided to delist some trading pairs. According to an official statement of the exchange representatives, OKX plans to delist several trading pairs including WAVES/USDC and WAVES/USDT on Feb. 8. The exchange said…

title: VeChain’s China Connection: A Game-Changer for Crypto and Blockchain
description: China is known to have banned crypto-related transactions, however, it is reported to have developed a soft spot for blockchain with VeChain making a huge presence within the region.  VeChain has over the years established a partnership agreement with Chinese-based companies including Walmart China and China Animal Health and Food Safety Alliance (CAFA).  VeChain’s presence [...]

title: Pyth Network (PYTH) Price Prediction 2024-2030: Will the PYTH Price Hit $1 Soon?
description:
What is Pyth Network (PYTH)? As an oracle, Pyth Network publishes financial market data to diverse blockchains in the industry. The Pyth Network team boasts that over 90 first-party publishers contributed to their market data. From this combined market data, the network offers price feeds for a number of different asset classes, such as US […]
